Author: Little-Rexy
Text: Ouffffff- you may be on shaky grounds; with a potential co-defendant relationship. I do feel with your own words; you may already know that this is possible.  I hope that you can be honest with her; praying- she can be honest with you after you open up, and talk to her about your own triggers.    Honesty is ALWAYS the best way-   think... if you were to hold onto these feelings for a long time trying to maintain a friendship where will it lead you both?   You are strong and brave- you both can begin to  heal if you both share if just a little- it is the silence about the disorder that helps it grow.
